description: Long-form multi-cloud training orchestration for Hugging Face, Vertex AI, Kubernetes and AWS SageMaker

providers.name: Vertex AI embedding lane
providers.notes: Dry-run uses `--dry-run`. Execute mode submits a Vertex training job.

providers.name: Kubernetes long-run job lane
providers.command: kubectl apply -f k8s/training/phdm21d-longrun-training.yaml && kubectl get jobs -n scbe-training
providers.notes: Runs a long-running job that you can swap to a real trainer image/entrypoint.

providers.name: AWS SageMaker long-run distillation lane
providers.notes: Uses a rendered AWS spec and submits a real SageMaker job in execute mode.
